front.title: An I2NSF Framework for Security Management Automation in Cloud-Based Security Systems

author.organization: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering

abstract.t: This document describes a Framework for Interface to Network Security Functions (I2NSF) in [RFC8329] for Security Management Automation (SMA) in Cloud-Based Security Systems. This security management automation facilitates Closed-Loop Security Control, Security Policy Translation, and Security Audit. To support these three features in SMA, this document specifies an extended architecture of the I2NSF framework with new system components and new interfaces. Thus, the SMA in this document can facilitate Intent-Based Security Management with Intent-Based Networking (IBN) in [RFC9315].
